attributes.action: Stop Mps claiming huge sums of money if they dont step down until the next general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not fair that some of them have abused the system and now they can remain to claim further salary and then at the end they can step down and recieve huge financial payouts. They should leave as soon as posible with no extra waste of taxpayers money.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
